feed.title: Ryan Wise Blog
feed.subtitle: Simple blog for keeping up with my developing and all the new projects I'm working on. I should be posting weekly or bi-weekly depending on my schedule! Note this site is still currently under development

entry.title: First Post!
entry.content:
Hi all!

This is my first blog post with Jekyll for my blog. I hope to add an interface that will let me post and build jekyll without manually creating a markdown file and running:

jekyll build --destination ../www/blog

but for now I will suffer with it.

If you don’t know what Jekyll is, it’s an awesome static site blog generator built with Ruby and it’s open source! Fuck yeah. Here is the link if you’re interested. jekyll
